comments:
Description:
Fail to connect xml data source in local net
Build number:2.3.0.v200712071151

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview attached report in linux. The report has xml data source and dataset. Click Test Connection in data source will display success dialog.

Expected result:
Display content.

Actual result:
Fail to get data.

Error log:
ReportDesign (id = 1):
- Cannot execute the statement.
no protocol: \\qaant\QA\DtE Test File\XML\subreport.xml
